abstract.t: This draft suggests a standard form for transforming SPKI certificates encoded using S-expressions from and to XML documents. We present a XML Schema for the encoding and validation of SPKI certificates and other SPKI objects such as sequences and ACLs, and discuss different possibilities for the transformation of S- expressions into an XML document and vice-versa. The XML Schema is based on the 'SPKI Certificate Structure' [SPKI].
